title: Calories in a 1/4 Cup of Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in a 1/4 cup of sugar (assuming common '1/4' query), with full nutrition facts including carbs, sugars, and variations for different sugar types.
h1: Calories in a 1/4 Cup of Sugar

quick_answer.text: A 1/4 cup of granulated sugar provides about 194 calories, all from simple carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Raw cane sugar (per cup, similar density)

faqs.q: How many calories in a 1/4 cup of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 194 calories for granulated white sugar.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 1/4 cup sugar?
faqs.a: 50 g of carbohydrates, all as sugars with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much does 1/4 cup of sugar weigh?
Calories in brown sugar vs. white for 1/4 cup?
faqs.a: Similar; brown is about 190 calories due to slight moisture difference.

faqs.q: Does sugar have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, granulated sugar is pure carbs with 0 g protein and 0 g fat.
